Wondrous item, legendary (requires attunement)
This black cloak appears to be made of pure shadow and shrouds you in darkness. While wearing it, you gain the following benefits:

  • You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
  • You have resistance to necrotic damage.
  • You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.zAdVL033HkTXL6Nq]{darkness} and @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.xhRzHohXcal3iFYK]{misty step} spells from it at will. Casting either spell from the cloak requires an action. Instead of a silvery mist when you cast @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.xhRzHohXcal3iFYK]{misty step}, you are engulfed in the darkness of the cloak and emerge from the cloak’s darkness at your destination.
  • You can use an action to cast the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.IXPJyBevdLlFAPCd]{black tentacles} or @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPlivingshadows0]{living shadows} spell from it. The cloak can’t be used this way again until the following dusk.
